paper_title: Uncertainty-aware phase prediction of RMPEAs via mixture density networks

claims.claim: The MDN model trained for the BCC phase identifies covalent radius, crystal radius, MB electronegativity, Ω, and atomic-size mismatch δ as the five most influential features
instruction: The code loads the trained model, performs the input-perturbation feature-importance analysis, and generates a ranked feature-importance plot
Confirm that the top five features in the ranking are covalent radius, crystal radius, MB electronegativity, Ω, and atomic-size mismatch (δ).
